title: Smash
directions: Put sugar, mint and a little water in a small tumbler or Old-fashioned glass and muddle to crush the mint and dissolve the sugar. Add ice and pour in the liquor. Finish with a little club soda, if you like, and garnish with a sprig of mint.
ingredients: 1 1/2 to 3 ounces liquor (brandy, gin, rum or any whiskey)
